org.lenskit.mooc.nonpers.mean

Class ItemMeanModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lenskit.mooc.nonpers.mean.ItemMeanModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    @Shareable
 @Immutable
 @DefaultProvider(value=ItemMeanModelProvider.class)
public class ItemMeanModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A model class that stores item mean ratings.

    The Shareable annotation is common for model objects, and tells LensKit that the class can be shared between multiple recommender instances.

    The DefaultProvider annotation tells LensKit to use a provider class — the mean item scorer provider — to create instances of this class.

    You should not need to make any changes to this class.

    See Also:
